title: 4th of July Banner - Fourth of July Bunting American Banner - July 4th Garland 4th of July Decor - Happy 4th of July Banner Patriotic Garland by Jolly Jon
features: 4th JULY BANNER - Both burlap buntings are ready to unfold and hang up. Each garland measures 8 feet in length and the pennants are adjustable on the strings. The pennant flags measure 7 inches in length x 5.2 inches in width with letters being painted on one side only
STAR GARLAND - You will receive one assembled 10 foot long cardstock banner of red white and blue stars. Each star measures 2 inches point to point and the color is vibrant on both sides

READY TO HANG - The flag garlands are pre-cut, handmade, and assembled on strings ready for your family, friends, or co-workers to hang! This could allow you more time to celebrate as you wish and less time spent decorating
REUSABLE - Not just for use one holiday season. You will want to display this patriotic banner as a holiday decoration year after year

PRODUCT GUARANTEE - As the Amazon brand registered owner of Jolly Jon products, KyVintageAndMore wants you to be happy with any product you purchase and offers a no questions asked, 30 day money back satisfaction guarantee on your purchase
description: 4th of July Bunting Banner - Kids and adults both will love our rustic patriotic signs and Independence Day decorations.
Decorating cannot get any easier than this. Use the star streamer with the burlap bunting or alone.
Simply unfold and hang these assembled banners and enjoy. The hardest part is deciding where you want to hang them.
Show how proud you are to be an American with red white and blue flag decorations you can use indoors hanging from a mantle or outdoors in your home backyard.

This Fourth of July burlap banner would look amazing on a Fourth of July parade float, on a boat, as window or wall decor at your house, for a photo backdrop or photo prop, hanging from a staircase, at the office, at a holiday barbeque, as patriotic party decor, and much more.
Stars and stripes adorn a polyester pennant on each side of the top banner creating a vintage Americana look that fits perfectly in a farmhouse or modern setting.

The star garland can be used for decoration alone at other holidays such as Memorial Day, Veterans Day, for elections, military deployment or homecoming, and as a tree garland with patriotic ornaments.
